summary.para: Adds a behavior to the viewport and returns a cookie to the caller.

param.name: behavior
param.para: A behavior created using the CreateBehavior method.

param.name: cookie
param.para: A cookie is returned so the caller can remove this behavior later. This allows the caller to release any reference on the behavior and let Direct Manipulation maintain an appropriate lifetime, similar to event handlers.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. Attaching a behavior that is already attached to this viewport or another viewport results in a failure.

remarks.para: A behavior takes effect immediately after AddBehavior is called. This must be considered when adding a behavior during an active manipulation or inertia phase.

summary.para: Removes all behaviors added to the viewport.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: RemoveAllBehaviors only returns an error if the removal of a behavior from the viewport was unsuccessful. In the event that a specific behavior is not removed successfully, RemoveAllBehaviors removes all remaining behaviors.

summary.para: Removes a behavior from the viewport that matches the given cookie.

param.name: cookie
param.para: A valid cookie returned from the AddBehavior call on the same viewport.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. If the behavior has already been removed or if the behavior is not attached to this viewport a failure is returned.

summary.para: Provides management of behaviors on a viewport. A behavior affects the functionality of a particular part of the Direct Manipulation workflow.

remarks.para: IDirectManipulationViewport2 can be used in place of IDirectManipulationViewport.
Behaviors are created using IDirectManipulationManager2 and an appropriate class ID.
A behavior can be attached or removed at any time and takes effect immediately (even during an active manipulation or inertia animation).
